- search_discount : If there is any discount on the item at the time of original search.
- details_url : the details link (can be passed into the Game details from Steam URL Endpoint)
- search_term : the search term that was used to find this item

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from steam game id or app id
tool_list.tool description:
Pass in the steam game id and retrieve the details for the game.

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative.
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game search by Game Title
tool_list.tool description:
This allows you to search for a game by its title, the returned result matches games similar to the title and also matches the title, but the returned list will still need to be checked for the correct game title. 

**Returned Items:**

- title: Title of the game
- category (search term)
- md5 (from title)
- image_thumbnail
- search_released : Game Release Date
- search_review_summary : if there is comments on the reviews
- search_price : Price at the time of the original search in USD
- search_discount : If there is any discount on the item at the time of original search.
- details_url : the details link (can be passed into the Game details from Steam URL Endpoint)
- search_term : the search term that was used to find this item
- game_id : the id of the game (can be passed into the Game Details from Steam game id Endpoint)
tool_list.executed_output: {'message': 'You are not subscribed to this API.'}

tool_list.tool description: Searches OpenCritic for games with similar names/titles. Search results are based on inverse trigram distance, with 0 being a perfect match and 1 being no shared/overlapping trigrams. query: I'm interested in Elden Ring - can you tell me its details on Steam, how it ranked in the 2023 Hall of Fame, what the current player count is compared to CS:GO (app ID 730), and if there have been any recent delay announcements about its DLC from sites like PCGamer, GamesRadar, or IGN? Also, what are critics saying about it recently?

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from Steam URL
tool_list.tool description:
You can pass in a Steam app or game url here and it will return the details. 

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative. 
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id
tool_list.executed_output: {'message': 'You are not subscribed to this API.'}

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game search by Game Title
tool_list.tool description:
This allows you to search for a game by its title, the returned result matches games similar to the title and also matches the title, but the returned list will still need to be checked for the correct game title. 

**Returned Items:**

- title: Title of the game
- category (search term)
- md5 (from title)
- image_thumbnail
- search_released : Game Release Date
- search_review_summary : if there is comments on the reviews
- search_price : Price at the time of the original search in USD
- search_discount : If there is any discount on the item at the time of original search.
- details_url : the details link (can be passed into the Game details from Steam URL Endpoint)
- search_term : the search term that was used to find this item
- game_id : the id of the game (can be passed into the Game Details from Steam game id Endpoint)

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from Steam URL
tool_list.tool description:
You can pass in a Steam app or game url here and it will return the details. 

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative. 
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id

task_description: This task helps a gamer decide whether to buy a game by combining real-time pricing and deal information with current reviews, player statistics, and news from various sources.

query: I'm thinking of buying Elden Ring on PC. What's the best price I can find right now, what are critics saying about it, and have there been any recent game release delays reported by GamesRadar that might affect similar RPGs I'm interested in? Also, curious how the player count for CS:GO has been trending lately and what PC Gamer is saying about Destiny 2's latest updates.

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from Steam URL
tool_list.tool description:
You can pass in a Steam app or game url here and it will return the details. 

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative. 
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game search by Game Title
tool_list.tool description:
This allows you to search for a game by its title, the returned result matches games similar to the title and also matches the title, but the returned list will still need to be checked for the correct game title. 

**Returned Items:**

- title: Title of the game
- category (search term)
- md5 (from title)
- image_thumbnail
- search_released : Game Release Date
- search_review_summary : if there is comments on the reviews
- search_price : Price at the time of the original search in USD
- search_discount : If there is any discount on the item at the time of original search.
- details_url : the details link (can be passed into the Game details from Steam URL Endpoint)
- search_term : the search term that was used to find this item
- game_id : the id of the game (can be passed into the Game Details from Steam game id Endpoint)

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from steam game id or app id
tool_list.tool description:
Pass in the steam game id and retrieve the details for the game. 

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative. 
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id

tool_list.tool name: Steam Game Search and Details: Game details from steam game id or app id
tool_list.tool description:
Pass in the steam game id and retrieve the details for the game.

**Returned Items:**
- title : The Game Title
- category : The first category found in popular_tags
- md5 : MD5 from the title
- game_description_snippet : Short text used to describe the game.
- game_review_summary : Text showing if the overall reviews are positive or negative
- responsive_reviewdesc : Text showing the percentage of reivews and the number with positive or negative. 
- review_number : The number of total reviews.
- release_date : The date the game was released
- developer : Game Developer
- publisher : Game Publisher
- popular_tags : all of the tags used to categorise the game
- video_webm : the 1st video url found for this game
- video_webm_hd : the 1st video url found for this game in HD (where available)
- video_poster : the poster image url used for the 1st video
- image_highlight : the 1st image url found in large res
- game_area_description : the full HTML for the game description area
- sys_req : if system requirements are found for the game
- community_hub_url : url to the games community discussions hub
- game_url : the games url
- game_id : the game id

tool_list.tool name: Monster Hunter Rise Equipment Database: Main Fetch Endpoint
tool_list.tool description:
Used to access all armor and weapons
Format of the armor fetch is {rank}-{amorType}
Where rank is either "lr" or "hr" and armorType is one of the following:
Head
Chest
Arms
Waist
Legs

Example: "lr-waist" to get all low-rank waist armor.

To get a type of weapon is a selection of these slugs:
gs - Greatswords
ls - Longswords
sns - Swords and Shields
db - Dual Blades
h - Hammers
hh - Hunting Horns
l - Lances
gl - Gunlanes
sa - Switch Axes
cb - Charge Blades
ig - Insect Glaives
lbg - Low Bow Guns
hbg - Heavy Bow Guns
b - Bows

tool_list.tool description:
Used to access all armor and weapons
Format of the armor fetch is {rank}-{amorType}
Where rank is either "lr" or "hr" and armorType is one of the following:
Head
Chest
Arms
Waist
Legs

Example: "lr-waist" to get all low-rank waist armor.

To get a type of weapon is a selection of these slugs:
gs - Greatswords
ls - Longswords
sns - Swords and Shields
db - Dual Blades
h - Hammers
hh - Hunting Horns
l - Lances
gl - Gunlanes
sa - Switch Axes
cb - Charge Blades
ig - Insect Glaives
lbg - Low Bow Guns
hbg - Heavy Bow Guns
b - Bows

tool_list.tool name: Monster Hunter Rise Equipment Database: Main Fetch Endpoint
tool_list.tool description:
Used to access all armor and weapons
Format of the armor fetch is {rank}-{amorType}
Where rank is either "lr" or "hr" and armorType is one of the following:
Head
Chest
Arms
Waist
Legs

Example: "lr-waist" to get all low-rank waist armor.

To get a type of weapon is a selection of these slugs:
gs - Greatswords
ls - Longswords
sns - Swords and Shields
db - Dual Blades
h - Hammers
hh - Hunting Horns
l - Lances
gl - Gunlanes
sa - Switch Axes
cb - Charge Blades
ig - Insect Glaives
lbg - Low Bow Guns
hbg - Heavy Bow Guns
b - Bows

Format of the armor fetch is {rank}-{amorType}

Head
Chest
Arms
Waist
Legs

Example: "lr-waist" to get all low-rank waist armor.

gs - Greatswords
ls - Longswords
sns - Swords and Shields
db - Dual Blades
h - Hammers
hh - Hunting Horns
l - Lances
gl - Gunlanes
sa - Switch Axes
cb - Charge Blades
ig - Insect Glaives
lbg - Low Bow Guns
hbg - Heavy Bow Guns
b - Bows
